description:
The Keroro Platoon continues its top-secret mission on the planet Sengoku Ran. This time they try to rescue Princess Momo before she`s forced to marry a Viper, with explosive results!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Musha Kero: Volume 3, Big Explosion, Close Call For Princess Momo
武者ケロ 参の巻 大爆発 桃姫危機一髪!! でござそうろう
